title: Costa's French Market Doughnuts (Beignets)
ingredients: ['125ml water', '1 tablespoon yeast', '50g butter or lard', '100g caster sugar', '1 teaspoon salt', '250ml boiling water', '250ml evaporated milk', '2 eggs, beaten', '950g plain flour', '1L vegetable oil for frying', '125g icing sugar for dusting']
